menu.name: Margherita Pizza
menu.description: Classic pizza with fresh tomatoes, mozzarella cheese, and basil.

menu.name: Spaghetti Carbonara
menu.description: Traditional Italian pasta with creamy sauce, pancetta, and parmesan.

menu.name: Caesar Salad
menu.description: Crisp romaine lettuce with Caesar dressing, croutons, and parmesan.

menu.name: Grilled Chicken Sandwich
menu.description: Juicy grilled chicken breast with lettuce, tomato, and aioli on a toasted bun.

menu.name: Chocolate Lava Cake
menu.description: Rich chocolate cake with a molten center, served with vanilla ice cream.

menu.name: Tandoori Chicken
menu.description: Spicy and flavorful chicken marinated in yogurt and spices, cooked in a tandoor.

menu.name: Vegan Buddha Bowl
menu.description: A wholesome bowl with quinoa, roasted veggies, avocado, and tahini dressing.
